response.original_title: Sharon Corr: Live in S達o Paulo
response.overview: Ireland's most beloved singer-songwriter returns to the stage with a spectacular show recorded live in S達o Paulo, Brazil. The show was the official presentation of her third solo album "The Same Sun" and features all her solo hit single "Take A Minute" plus classics from The Corrs catalog such as 'Radio', 'Dreams' and 'So Young'.
response.tagline: Ireland's most beloved singer-songwriter returns to the stage with a spectacular show recorded live in S達o Paulo, Brazil, presenting "The Same Sun" album. Featuring all her solo hit singles plus "The Corrs" classics 'Radio', 'Dreams' and 'So Young'.
